name: The Abyss (theraveparade, Leshiy, Void watcher(0))
description: Do you hear the call of the depths? It’s a strange whisper that’s chasing you in your dreams. You can’t ignore it anymore, you need to follow its lead. Something is waiting for you there – in the house on the cliff over the ocean abyss. Accompany Vincent, a painter in an art crisis, in his journey and unravel the mystery of the gloomy house. Don’t lose vigilance. Who knows what’s hiding in the water.
